channel.title: Wat is going on with the status page?
channel.description: Im sorry, but i just HAD to ask this question, It seems like all servers are going away and they wont let you post any servers? Help Plz, I want my server up Cuz google barely brings me any people and so Does Frugoo

item.title: Wat is going on with the status page?
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

They can just contact either Moparisthebest or srt8.

Read full topic
item.source: Wat is going on with the status page?

item.title: Wat is going on with the status page?
item.dc:creator: @noobspure50 noobspure50
item.description:
@noobspure50 wrote:

They need a correct page to post these types of things on (rants, server problems, ect ect)

Read full topic
item.source: Wat is going on with the status page?

item.title: Wat is going on with the status page?
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

[quote=“jc22493, post:5, topic:275066”][quote author=x blitz x link=topic=363393.msg2760544#msg2760544 date=1240518851]

Well they wouldn’t let me post any 500+ servers or a 477, sadly they only accept 317’s.

They accept any types of servers; they just can’t detect 503’s+ yet.

http://moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=63.223.120.146
525 Server.
[/quote]
You have to host two servers, both on different ports. Example - I have a 317. I host it on port 5555, and I host my 508 on port 43594. I register my 317, but in the information section, I post about the 508.

In that person’s case, he is hosting a 317, and in the information section, he gives a website link that probably has the download to a 525 client which connects to his server.[/quote]
You know, I thought about that just after I posted =P, I’m stupid when I’m tired lol.

Read full topic
item.source: Wat is going on with the status page?

item.title: Wat is going on with the status page?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“x blitz x, post:4, topic:275066”][quote author=jc22493 link=topic=363393.msg2760542#msg2760542 date=1240518743]

Well they wouldn’t let me post any 500+ servers or a 477, sadly they only accept 317’s.

They accept any types of servers; they just can’t detect 503’s+ yet.
[/quote]
http://moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=63.223.120.146
525 Server.[/quote]
You have to host two servers, both on different ports. Example - I have a 317. I host it on port 5555, and I host my 508 on port 43594. I register my 317, but in the information section, I post about the 508.

In that person’s case, he is hosting a 317, and in the information section, he gives a website link that probably has the download to a 525 client which connects to his server.

Read full topic
item.source: Wat is going on with the status page?
